poweredBy: Powered by Vite, React, and i18next.

notFound.description: Looks like you've ventured into the unknown digital realm.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Virtual Fixmed ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our educational platform.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you:
items: Create an account (email, name, password)
Use our platform and services
Contact our support team
Participate in surveys or provide feedback

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process your registration and manage your account
Send you technical notices and support messages
Respond to your comments and questions
Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With your consent
To comply with legal obligations
To protect our rights and prevent fraud
With service providers who assist in operating our platform

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
items: Access your personal data
Correct inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data
Object to processing of your data
Export your data
Withdraw consent at any time

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies necessary for the platform to function properly. These cookies enable basic features like user authentication and security.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: contact@virtualfixmed.com

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Virtual Fixmed ("the Platform"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Platform.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Virtual Fixmed is an educational platform designed for medical training and education. The Platform provides access to educational content, interactive learning tools, and related services.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: To use certain features, you must create an account. You are responsible for:
items: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
All activities that occur under your account
Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use
Providing accurate and complete registration information

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
items: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Infringe upon the rights of others
Distribute malware or harmful code
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Platform
Use the Platform for any commercial purpose without permission
Share your account credentials with others

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality of the Platform are owned by Virtual Fixmed and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Platform is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the Platform will be error-free or uninterrupted. The educational content is for informational purposes only and does not constitute professional medical advice.

limitation.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Virtual Fixmed shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the Platform.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these Terms or for any other reason at our discretion. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting us.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting a notice on the Platform or sending you an email. Your continued use after such changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at: contact@virtualfixmed.com

auth.createAccountDescription: Enter your details to create your account
auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.registrationSuccessMessage: We've sent you a confirmation email. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
auth.termsAndPrivacy: By continuing, you agree to our {{termsLink}} and {{privacyLink}}

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

updatePassword.title: Update password
updatePassword.errorDescription: The password reset link is invalid or has expired
updatePassword.resendSuccess: Password reset link sent! Check your email.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordRequiresLowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
validation.passwordRequiresUppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
validation.passwordRequiresSymbol: Password must contain a special character

profile.firstNameMinLength: First name must be at least 2 characters
profile.firstNameMaxLength: First name must be at most 50 characters
profile.lastNameMinLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
profile.lastNameMaxLength: Last name must be at most 50 characters
profile.titleMaxLength: Title must be at most 100 characters
profile.universityMaxLength: University must be at most 200 characters

errors.unknownError: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.emailNotConfirmed: Please confirm your email before logging in

profile.title: Profile
profile.emailOAuthNote: Email is managed by your OAuth provider.
profile.verificationNote: Check your inbox to verify your email address.

security.title: Security
security.description: Manage your sign-in and security settings.
security.passwordOAuthNote: Password is managed by your OAuth provider.
security.passwordVerificationRequired: Please verify your email to change your password.
security.passwordResetNote: Check your email to reset your password.
security.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account.

privacy.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.confirmationHint: Type DELETE to confirm account deletion

affectedData.title: Data that will be deleted:
affectedData.profile: Profile data (first name, last name, email)

error.description: Something went wrong. Please try again.

subscription.noSubscriptionDesc: Select a plan to get started.

paymentManagement.title: Payment management
paymentManagement.descriptionText: Open the billing portal to update your card and view invoices.

currency.disclaimer: Displayed price is an estimate in {{currency}}. Final amount may vary.

cookieConsent.title: Cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use essential cookies to ensure the app works correctly. These cookies are necessary for basic functionality.
cookieConsent.byClickingAccept: By clicking Accept you consent to the use of these cookies.
